settings.text: Experience full-body relaxation in an all-weather outdoor infrared sauna. Each sauna is carefully designed and durable to keep you comfortable and healthy at home.

Outexer Outdoor Sauna

Outexer Outdoor Infrared Saunas are designed to bring professional wellness to your backyard, patio or garden. Made from natural weather-resistant materials such as Canadian hemlock, okoume and cedar, and equipped with an advanced infrared carbon fiber heating system and intelligent control system, it can bring you a comfortable, safe and energy-saving sauna experience rain or shine.
Each sauna has a durable and simple appearance that can withstand the erosion of the outdoor environment for a long time and perfectly integrate into the outdoor space of a modern family. High-quality tempered glass doors and windows provide a wide view and a sense of transparency, ensuring both visual and practical comfort even when fully occupied.

Why choose Outexer?

All-weather craftsmanship: All saunas are designed with moisture-proof wood and sealed seams, and the top is a sloping roof and reinforced waterproof materials to resist outdoor moisture, UV rays and temperature changes, and can be used year-round.
Long-lasting performance: Designed for high-frequency use and environmental pressures, each product is equipped with a reinforced frame and stable heating system to ensure stability and comfort in long-term use.
Multiple configurations: Available in compact or spacious outdoor models for patios, balconies or garden spaces, it‚Äôs perfect for families, couples or individuals to enjoy some outdoor relaxation.
Low maintenance: Easy-to-wipe clean surfaces and electronics that have been rigorously tested for safety and durability are designed for outdoor environments, making them hassle-free.

Health Benefits of Outdoor Infrared Saunas

  • Relieve muscle tension and joint pain after activity
  • Boost blood circulation for faster recovery
  • Reduce stress and improve sleep quality
  • Increase perspiration and detoxification for clearer skin
  • Assists weight management and overall metabolic health

Frequently Asked Questions (Outdoor Sauna FAQ)

1. Are infrared saunas suitable for outdoor use?
Yes. Outexer outdoor infrared saunas meet safety standards with insulating materials and low-electromagnetic radiation heating panels. Their fully enclosed design retains heat and prevents water ingress, making them suitable for long-term outdoor use.

2. How do I install an outdoor sauna?
Our outdoor saunas are modular in design for easy self-assembly. Pre-assembled components and detailed instructions (including video tutorials) make installation quick and easy with minimal tools required.

3. Do outdoor saunas require special circuit setups?
Depending on the wattage, some models may require a 20A circuit (such as NEMA 5-20R or 6-20R). Please refer to the "Electrical Specifications" of each product or contact customer service for recommendations.

4. Can these saunas be used year-round?
‚ÄãAbsolutely. All Outexer outdoor saunas are designed for all-season use, with sealed construction, high-efficiency insulation and weather-resistant coatings.

settings.custom_liquid:
Outexer Outdoor Sauna FAQs

Are infrared saunas suitable for outdoor use?
Yes. Outexer outdoor infrared saunas meet safety standards with insulating materials and low-electromagnetic radiation heating panels. Their fully enclosed design retains heat and prevents water ingress, making them suitable for long-term outdoor use.
How do I install an outdoor sauna?
Our outdoor saunas are modular in design for easy self-assembly. Pre-assembled components and detailed instructions (including video tutorials) make installation quick and easy with minimal tools required.
Do outdoor saunas require special circuit setups?
Depending on the wattage, some models may require a 20A circuit (such as NEMA 5-20R or 6-20R). Please refer to the "Electrical Specifications" of each product or contact customer service for recommendations.
Can these saunas be used year-round?
Absolutely. All Outexer outdoor saunas are designed for all-season use, with sealed construction, high-efficiency insulation and weather-resistant coatings.
Can Outexer outdoor saunas handle rain and snow?
Yes. All Outexer outdoor models are designed with weather-resistant materials, including sealed Canadian hemlock or cedar wood, waterproof roofs, and rust-resistant accessories. They are designed to withstand year-round rain, snow, and varying temperatures, making them perfect for a backyard or patio.
Does an outdoor sauna need to be placed on a special foundation?
We recommend placing your sauna on a flat and stable surface, such as concrete pads, pavers, or a wooden deck. It‚Äôs best to avoid setting it directly on soil or areas that stay damp for long periods. While our saunas feature a durable, waterproof base, having a proper foundation ensures better stability, drainage, and longevity‚Äîespecially in regions with frequent rain or snow.
What if my HOA or local regulations do not allow outdoor sauna installations?
We recommend checking with your HOA or local authorities about building policies before placing an order. If outdoor setups are not permitted, you can still enjoy the same relaxation and health benefits by choosing one of our indoor sauna models, which are compact, easy to install, and HOA-friendly. üëâ Explore Indoor Saunas.

settings.heading: 6. Does an outdoor sauna need to be placed on a special foundation?

settings.heading: 7. How do I place an order and use a discount code?
settings.row_content:
Placing an order at Outexer.com is easy and secure:

1. Select the sauna model you like and click "Add to Cart".
2. Go to the shopping cart and check out.
3. Fill in your shipping and contact information.
4. On the checkout page, you'll see a field where you can enter a discount code if you have one.
5. If you don't have a discount code, don't worry - any available promotions or automatic discounts will be applied at checkout, and you'll see the final price before paying.

Simply follow the checkout steps to see a full breakdown before confirming your purchase.
